generated_doNotEdit.title: Buoyant
generated_doNotEdit.description: Enables an entity to float on the specified liquid blocks.

fields.title: Apply Gravity
fields.description: Applies gravity each tick. Causes more of a wave simulation, but will cause more gravity to be applied outside liquids.

fields.title: Base Buoyancy
fields.description: Base buoyancy used to calculate how much will a mob float.

fields.title: Big Wave Probability
fields.description: Probability for a big wave hitting the entity. Only used if `simulate_waves` is true.

fields.title: Big Wave Speed
fields.description: Multiplier for the speed to make a big wave. Triggered depending on 'big_wave_probability'.

fields.title: Drag Down On Buoyancy Removed
fields.description: How much an actor will be dragged down when the Buoyancy Component is removed.

fields.title: Liquid Blocks
fields.description: List of blocks this entity can float on. Must be a liquid block.

fields.title: Simulate Waves
fields.description: Should the movement simulate waves going through.
